mapper.select: UPDATE book SET star = (SELECT avg(star) FROM bookreview WHERE bkid = #{bkid}) WHERE bkid = #{bkid}
select * from bookreview where bkid = #{bkid} order by rid desc

mapper.update: update bookreview set content = #{content}, star = #{star} where rid = #{rid} and user_id = #{user_id}
